lead_paragraph: The tests, called liquid biopsies, capture cancer cells or DNA that tumors shed into the blood, instead of taking tissue from the tumor itself.

headline.print_headline: New Test Could Spare Patients From Biopsies
headline.main: New Test Could Spare Patients From Biopsies

snippet: The tests, called liquid biopsies, capture cancer cells or DNA that tumors shed into the blood, instead of taking tissue from the tumor itself.
abstract: New type of blood test, called liquid biopsy, may transform tumor cell monitoring by capturing cancer cells that tumors shed into blood, instead of taking tissue from tumor itself.
